ygData.subject: Lurker will be back

To Lurker's RPGs,
        This is Michael's brother, but Michael's probably=
 better known as Lurker, from what I've seen.  I am sending this letter to =
let you all know that recently, Lurker has been having tough times.  His gi=
rlfriend broke up with him, whom he will never forget, and other personal m=
atters have been happening, and he hasn't been the same.  This morning, I f=
ound him in his room with a knife, and he had threatened to kill himself, b=
ut inisisted that he loved you all too much to go.  He may come on tonight,=
 but if not, he'll probably come on tomorrow or the day after, somewhere ar=
ound there.  As his brother, I ask that when he does come back, please don'=
t be too hard on him, he has it hard enough as it is.  Lurker also said tha=
t you guys can make him feel much better.  

                              =
                                                          Sincerely,    Dav=
id Coburn


P.S. Roland, Lurker wanted me to pass this on to you:  "CHEESE!=
"
